channel.title: One Small Error
channel.description:
NPCHandler.java:1456: illegal start of expression public int GetNPCDropArrayID(int NPCID, int DropType) { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
Whats Wrong With It?

item.title: One Small Error
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

MAIN ERROR: u must have changed the lines in npc handler which causes that error

STEP 1: reinstall ur source

STEP 2: copy the NPCHandler file in new source that you reinstalled to your main one (THESE 2 SOURCES MUST BE THE SAME)

STEP 3: COMPILE and RUN your server to test for any errors

STEP 4: Make a backup copy of the new source that you installed again

STEP 5: replace any files that have errors, with the backup source files

Read full topic

@NexondotNet wrote:

u must have changed the lines in npc handler which causes stuff like that to happen i suggest u reinstall ur source and get a backup copy so if u come across that error u have ur backup copy to replace it
